name: Lost Lights (Insert Studio)
description:
Lost Lights

This is a educational game that teaches you about eclipses.

Help the Starites find their way back to the moon by matching the correct eclipse the Starites ask for in order to return them back.

Note: This is still in development and will be continuously  updated

**Update Log**

*10/8* - v1. Menu screen and lunar section with core mechanics. *small demo for mechanics*

Any feedback on the game will be much appreciated. You can either comment below or use this link to submit your feedback.
